blocks.text: To find the swing radius about a tangent—

blocks.description: Moment of inertia calculation for a right circular cylinder.

blocks.text: Example 41—To find the moment of inertia of a right circular cylinder of length L and radius R, about various axes.

blocks.caption: Fig. 58—
blocks.description: Illustration showing the right circular cylinder and the relevant axes around which the moment of inertia is calculated.

blocks.text: (a) About the axis of the cylinder.
(b) About an axis through the C. of G. perpendicular to the axis of the cylinder.
(c) About an axis parallel to that in (b), but through one end.
The moment of inertia is obtained from Example 40.

blocks.description: Total moment and result for the axis.

blocks.text: Hence the total and moment about the axis—

blocks.latex: I = \frac{1}{2} \pi R^{4} \rho L \quad \text{where } m = \text{mass of the cylinder.
blocks.description: Mass calculation linked to the moment of inertia.
